episodes.title: DAUGHTERS OF THE CULT—An evening with Anna and Celia LeBaron
episodes.description:
Subscribe to join the live chat @HiddenTrueCrime Anna and Celia LeBaron are subjects of the new Hulu Documentary by ABC News Studios “Daughters of the Cult” and Anna is author of the book: “The Polygamist's Daughter”

Ervil LeBaron, their father, was charged with ordering the murders of many of his opponents, including family members. Ervil used the religious doctrine of "Blood Atonement" to justify the murders.  Anna and Celia escaped the cult and tell their harrowing family story in this groundbreaking documentary. We are honored they will spend the evening with us and our Hidden gems tonight (Saturday) at 6:30 pacific 

DISCLAIMER: The views of our guests/interviewee's, do not reflect the views of Hidden True Crime.
subjects: Church of the First Born of the Lamb of God
